humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the tumor classification is pN2a, which means that there are metastases in 4 to 9 axillary lymph nodes. This corresponds to N2 according to the AJCC staging system (New Rule 14 and New Rule 15).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The 'pN2a' in the tumor classification of the report indicates that there are 1-3 axillary lymph nodes involved, but none are found in the sentinel node(s). This corresponds to an N2 stage in the TNM staging system, ignoring any substaging information.
